pages.text: This tab is the advanced version of the upgrade tab. While upgrading, you can also add stat boosters or stat containers to reinforce the upgrade.$(br2)The effective upgrade items that will be consumed in the next upgrade will be marked blue.

The stat display will mark the effect of upgrade items.$(li)For Main Stat Booster, the main stat will be highlighted.$(li)For Sub Stat Booster, all sub stat values will be marked, and one random sub stat will be picked.$(li)For Stat Container, the sub stat ame will be marked.$(li)If you use Stat Container with Sub Stat Booster, one sub stat entry will have both stat type and value highlighted.
